bibl.title: A Tenth Century List of Payments or Poll Tax Collecting on Paper from the Montserrat Collection.
bibl.note: List of payments written on the verso of a decorated piece of paper. Fayyum (?), tenth century.

bibl.title: From al-Andalus to Khurasan. Documents from the Medieval Muslim World

bibl.seg: Sofía Torallas Tovar, A Tenth Century List of Payments or Poll Tax Collecting on Paper from the Montserrat Collection.

Petra M. Sijpesteijn, Lennart Sundelin, Sofía Torallas Tovar & Amalia Zomeño (edd.), From al-Andalus to Khurasan. Documents from the Medieval Muslim World = Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts. 66 (Leiden, 2007) pp. 187-197 et pll. 11-12.
